PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_EarliestTim: Hours of the earliest time at which the event might happen.
Minutes of the earliest time at which the event might happen.
Total minutes of the earliest time at which the event might happen. Will be calculated as Hours * MinutesPerHour + Minutes.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_LatestTime_: Hours of the latest time at which the event might happen.
Minutes of the latest time at which the event might happen.
Total minutes of the latest time at which the event might happen. Will be calculated as Hours * MinutesPerHour + Minutes.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_HasMovement: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the event has a movement target. Must be closed using DailyRoutine_HasMovementTarget_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the event has a movement target.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_HasNoMoveme: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the event has no movement target. Must be closed using DailyRoutine_HasNoMovementTarget_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the event has no movement target.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_HasMovement: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the event has a movement target with an export name. Must be closed using DailyRoutine_HasMovementTargetExportName_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the event has a movement target with an export name.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_HasNoMoveme: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the event has no movement target with an export name. Must be closed using DailyRoutine_HasNoMovementTargetExportName_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the event has no movement target with an export name.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_MovementTar: Export Name of the movement target
Will be replaced with the export name of the movement target. If it has no export name the default name will be used.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_HasNoScript: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the event has no script. Must be closed using DailyRoutine_HasNoScript_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the event has no script.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_HasScript_S: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the event has a script. Must be closed using DailyRoutine_HasScript_End.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_HasScript_E: End of the content that will only be rendered if the event has a script.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_HasNodeGrap: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the event has a node graph script. Must be closed using DailyRoutine_HasNodeGraphScript_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the event has a node graph script.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_HasCodeScri: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the event has a code script. Must be closed using DailyRoutine_HasCodeScript_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the event has a code script.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_HasTargetSt: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the event has target state. Must be closed using DailyRoutine_HasTargetState_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the event has target state.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_HasNoTarget: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the event has no target state. Must be closed using DailyRoutine_HasNoTargetState_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the event has no target state.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_TargetState: Target state of the npc upon arriving at the event target.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_IsEnabledBy: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the event is enabled by default. Must be closed using DailyRoutine_IsEnabledByDefault_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the event is enabled by default.
PlaceholderDesc_DailyRoutine_IsDisabledB: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the event is disabled by default. Must be closed using DailyRoutine_IsDisabledByDefault_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the event is disabled by default.
